title: IWAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Consultant Post
description: Inland Waterways Authority of India (IWAI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBA can grab this chance and apply for the IWAI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are looking for...
